ekakata ekak paradinne nathi kathawath kiyalama innanko.ape ganpalathwala donga gas hariyata thiyenawa.donga walata api kiyanne china kottan kiyalayi.wade kiyanne ape gan tike arenna aayema china kottan thiyenne oya kaluthara sawiye witharayi.wishala gaswala hadena china kottan kiyanne bohoma rasa palathurak hariyata mangus wage habayi idunama kahapatayi.bohoma rasa china kottan hadena parana gas kipayak kollo andunagena thibuna.parana gas kiwwe china kottan gedi enna ennama mihiri rasayak ganne gas parana wenakotayi.ithin china kottan idena kaleta oya gasyata kollo podi kamin iduna china kottan walu walata polu gahanawa.gaha yata kahama kaha patata china kottan leli.

hethema me bawa...
dawasak sawas yamaye ejapa karyalaye pawathi raswimak atharathura mahath galagottiyaki.

thama karyalaye anekuth sangayan samanga siya sabandatha pilibandawa ek stha්riyak mese pawasuwaya; ”adahili kalliye inna kalaye wage anith ayage wada walata oluwa danne nathuwa e් ayata ka gahanne nathuwa inna mata karanna puluwan awama de e්kayi.”
me wadeta dasamekin wath apata sambandha wenna nam bari wuna .
apith digana oya pot ekata.”
mata mathaka hatiyata nam me wasangathaya ratata bo wune hata gananwala.
wenath kisidu samaja sewayak kirima
api wiwaha wenna sahakaruwek, sahakariyak thoraganiddi wadihitiyo godak salakilimath wena deyakne handahan.
"aarakshaka widya pitaya" neweyi, "jenaral sar jon kothalawala aarakshaka wishwa widayalaya" .
karyala ha gruhamaya jiwithaye boho wehesata pathwana mawuwarun sema yuwathiyo boho ikmaninma durwala akaryakshama ha widapath pirisak bawata path wethi.

brithanyaye pradhana sanghanayaka saha landan bauddha wiharaye wiharadhipathi pujya bogoda silawimala nayaka swamin wahanse wisin mehidi janadhipathithuma athue pirisa wetha charithranukulawa hisathel galwa aashirwada palakalaha.
ee athdakima nisa dan oona yuddhayakata ottuyi.
ewita owun wadathma prawesha wiya nohaki sthana athuluwa niwasa pura thaba athalingika kappaduwata ayath gruha bhanda, andum andinnan saha wathashraya pitupasa athi awakashaya.
adak wiwarawu muwin yuthuwa ohu aya desa asi piya nohela bala sitiyeya.
oya issara ne..

basnahira maha nagara sanwardhana wyapruthiya yatathe pradhana thema 10 k osse wyapruthi 160 k kriyathmaka kirimata niyamitha bawath, me siyalu katayuthu wenuwen amerikanu dolar biliyana 40 ka wiyadamak darimata siduwanu athayi asthamenthugatha kara athi bawath maha nagara saha basnahira sanwardhana amathya patali champika ranawaka pawasiya.amathiwaraya me bawa pawasuwe rajaye prawruththi departhamenthuwedi eeye (21) pawathi madhya hamuwak amathamini.
‘aanduwa wiwechanaya karannanta erehiwa sidu kala pa්rahara, adanthettam saha tharjana‘ _ lankawe manawa himikam ullanghanaya gana amarikanu warthawa
chandanage 'buru welandama ' kiyewwa.
thiru risikaranaya kirimen siyalu wadagath thorathuru kshanikawa balanna.
sithuwli pawura: awasanawata sathya kathawak : yakun ha prethayan samanga katha pela anka 04
blak list kala.
‘hondayi shramanaya, dewana prashnaya thopagen asami…purudu puhunu karana lada kawara dharmayak sapa laba deyida….?
ohu dutu de pilibanda pawasuwath kisiwaku eya wishwasa nokaleya.
“1816 di ingrisi jathikayin deshadrarohin yayi nam kala wayambaa palathe mathale disthrikkaye pawul 280 k ranawiru pawul washayen nam karanna rajaya thiranaya kara atha.’’
polisiyata ellawana chodana pilibandawa wimasima pinisa nithiya samaya bhara amathya sagala rathnayaka amathimata bibisi sinhala sewaya daru uthsahaya da sarthaka nowiya.
drawida sandhana pirisak indiyawata yathi kirthi warnakulasuriya drawida sandhana nayaka aar.

maha bosathanan wahanse wisin thaman wahanse ge mawa kara matha thabagena maha sayura tharanaya kota ethumiya ge aashirwadaya da, brahmadewa nam bhagyawathun wahanse samipayehi prathamawarata manopranidanaya da pawathwa ethan patan wisiasankheyya kalpa lakshayak perum dam pura jaya shri maha bo manda di sawasana sakala kleshayan prahanaya kota “anekajathi sansaran” yanadi washayen sinhanada pawathwa samyak sambuddhathwayen abhisheka ladda wu brahmathibrahma wu, dewathidewa wu, apata shasthaෲ wu bhagyawathun wahanse thama ekama pihita kota gena, ekama pilisarana kota gena ee manga yanno bauddhayo nam wethi.
sathyawashayenma mema deshapalana thinduwa hamuwe wagauththara karuwaku wi aththe mahinda rajapaksha mahathaya.
esema paddhathi mrudukanga men nowa dinen dina nawa yedum mrudukanga weladapolata ekathu wemin pawathi.
nidimatha gathiya nisa molaye sithime shakthiya aduwimak daknata labenawa
me okkoma puchchala damma.
eekata madhya magin nisi pracharaya laba denna puluwankama thiyenawanan me passe inna sinhala wyaparikayinta...
apen passe rassawa idiriyata geniyanna kenek naha.
kopayata path magiya kamal desa rawa bala mese asayi.
eeyeth ge langata enakan dennek passen aawa man kiwwa ane sori nangiyo mama bandala kiyala..
ape hungak bara wachana unge edineda pawichchi karana eewa..

hudek pasu giya masa nawaye di pamanak, loka samajawadi web adawiya, yuda ukusu jon maken gana sandarsge prashansawa; amasan kamkaruwanta sochcham payata dolar 15k gewimata (anekuth sahana ahimi wima nisa boho awasthawala di watup kappaduwak lesa) lokaye pohosath ma minisa wana jef besos gath thiranaya samarima; wenisiyulawata erehi eksath janapada prakopakaranaya sandaha ohuge sahayogaya; demokratik pakshaye hondama godanaganna wima pilibanda ohuge kayiwaru; “wiwrutha deshasimawalata” thama wiruddhathwaya prakasha karamin ha daridrapanna saranagathayinge gala eema amarikanu kamkaruwange jiwana thathwayanta tharjanaya karanu athi bawata anathuru angawamin tramp pasekin ohuge rawdima; ha eksath janapadayata udarpanaya kirimata muhuna dena ha oththubalima men ma kumanthranaya pilibanda maraniya chodanawalata muhana dena wiki liks aarambhaka juliyan asanj brithanya polisiya wisin pahara ganima sambandhayen ohuge saparadhi prasiddha nishshabdathawa satahan kara atha.
- pi.denishwaran (487)
'ape thaththala bande maha polowe ammala ya.
mahansiya agaya kalata umbaata sthuthiyi machan..
eeka harima suwapahasu iriyawwak.
kese wuwada mewara ohuge parikshawata bandun wu pan gediya kisisema pramithiyata anukulawa sakas nokala eetama aawenika wu gathi lakshanawalinda thorawu ‘kamakata nathi’ nishpadanayaki.
ee anuwa dedenatama awasthawa labadunna.
aththatama kiyanawanam kanyabhawaya rakagath kanthawata wada kanyabhawaya winasha karagath kanthawa shishta kanthawak kimata puluwan.
perawaru 07.50 wana wita ginna sampurnayen mada pawathwimata haki wu bawa da kiyayi.
eheth me podu sammathayata indura wenas wu sirithak sinhala aluth awurudda sambandhayen pawathi.
kunutika puchchala iwarawela, miris wagawata kalekin pohora danna bariuna nisa pohora damma.
thibichcha ekama gatalu meke jala sapayumak nathiwima witharayi.
mama kalin bas eke giya nisa bayik eka gaththata passe hamadama bas eke yanna wiyadam una mudala (100) wadata yana dawas gana anuwa hama masema (hold) karanawa
– layishan ganima !”
edina rathri aaharaya athishaya rasawath ekak wiya.

loka kusalana krikat tharangawaliye shri lankawa ha pakisthanaya athara labana 26 wanida pawathwena tharagaya narambaima sandaha rupiyal 50/- bagin prawesha pathra 9500 k nikuth kirima maligawaththa pi. di. sirisena kridanganayedi ada (19) sidu kerena bawa shri lanka krikat palaka mandalaya pawasayi.pradhana tharaga sandaha alewi kerena prawesha pathra siyallakma wikini awasan bawa shri lanka krikat palaka mandalaye aarakshaka pradhani mejar janaral lorans pranandu mahatha pawasayi.loka kusalana krikat tharangamalawedi shri lankawe kridangana thunakadi tharaga 12k pawathwena athara jathyanthara krikat kawunsilaye anumathiya yatathe eewaye siyalu katayuthu siduwana bawada hethema awadharanaya karayi.ee mahatha me bawa sandahan kale polis mulasthanaye di eeye (18) pawathi madhya hamuwakata ek wemini.pradhana tharanga sandaha nikuth kerena prawesha pathra siyallama me wanawitath alewi wi awasan bawa ki lorans pranandu mahatha thawath ithiriwa aththe rupiyal 50 bagin wana prawesha pathra pamanak bawa kiweya.mahajana illim salaka bala rupiyal 50 prawesha pathra nikuth kirimata thiranaya kala bawath ada perawaru 8.30 sita maligawaththa pi. di. sirisena kridanganayen mema prawesha pathra laba gatha haki bawath hethema prakasha kaleya.krikat kridawa haraha shri lankawe kirthiya lowatama pradarshanaya kala haki hondama awasthawa me loka kusalana krikat tharaga malawa bawa ki ee mahatha lokaye ratawal 9ka kridakayan athulu wishala pirisak me awasthawata sahabhagi wana bawa pawasiya.polispathi mahinda balasuriya, shri lanka krikat palaka mandalaye pradhana widhayaka niladhari ajith jayasekara mahathwaruda me awasthawata ekwa sitiyaha..
